content.description: The writer is considering replacing the underlined portion of sentence 11 (reproduced below).
content.question: In one study, test subjects did a bunch of things with a humanlike robot called Nao.Which of the following versions of the underlined text most closely fits the style of the passage?

choices.label: executed an array of assigned enterprises

skill.text: Skill 8.A: Strategically use words, comparisons, and syntax to convey a specific tone or style in an argument.
